title: Facebook will just create your stories for you now
description: Having trouble creating the perfect Facebook story post? This new feature might help.

title: Sony's new open-back headphones offer pros the wonders of spatial audio
description: As spatial audio becomes increasingly popular, these new headphones are aimed at helping creators produce it.

title: Singapore opens up its airport to the metaverse
description: Singapore's Changi Airport can now be explored on Roblox, where users will be able to experience a virtual representation of the airport's popular features such as an indoor waterfall.

title: How to use Spotify's built-in equalizer for better sounding music
description: Spotify has a built-in equalizer that can greatly improve how you hear your favorite songs and podcasts. Here's what you need to know.

title: Zorin OS demonstrates exactly what a desktop operating system should be
description: There is one Linux distribution to rule them all, but it's not the one you think it is.

title: How these two Google Docs features can simplify your work life
description: Want to add project management to your Google Docs? Here's what you need to know.

title: This $8 tool has dramatically improved my 3D printing results
description: A tool normally used for metalwork is surprisingly perfect for tidying up my 3D prints and it's so satisfying to use.
